name: Dual Chop
description: You lash out at a creature(s) with two quick strikes. Make two melee attack rolls, dealing 1d6 + MOVE dragon damage with each hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Badly startles Pokemon that used a move of the same type.
